pages.text: The Nether is a horrible place. It is swelteringly hot dimension, with a sizeable number of unique ores, and of course, things that want to kill you.
Atlarus geodes form under the extreme temperature and pressure at the bottom of the nether. These geodes are encased in brimstone, and also contain large amounts of basalt and magma.
Everything else about the Nether is well documented in other places, so this book will not be going over anything else about the dimension.
